name: Blade Arcus Rebellion from Shining
overview: Blade Arcus Rebellion from Shining is a fighting game developed by Studio Saizensen and published by Sega. It features the characters of the famous Shining series. A crossover from the Shining series? Well, Blade Arcus Rebellion from Shining does the work for a crossover the characters from Shining Blade and Shining Hearts for this 2D fighting game. Over 20 characters appear in the game Features characters from Shining series and Sonia from Shining Resonance Refrain Includes character skills, a growth element that allows you to unlock skills through acquiring points in battle and online mode
